title: Miami-Fort Lauderdale-West Palm Beach metro area population U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: This statistic shows the area of the Miami Lauderdale-West Palm metropolitan metro in the population from 2010 to 2018 .
In 2018 , about 6086935 million people lived in the Miami Lauderdale-West Palm metropolitan metro .
gold: This statistic shows the population of the Miami-Fort Lauderdale-West Palm Beach area in the United States from 2010 to 2018.
In 2018 , about 6.19 million people lived in the Miami-Fort Lauderdale-West Palm Beach metropolitan area .
